vote.title:
Authorizing the issuance of limited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $1,000,000.00 for fleet management-related projects; and to declare an emergency ($1,000,000.00).

Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
vote.description:
Explanation
This ordinance authorizes the issuance of limited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $1,000,000.00 for fleet management-related projects.  The bond sale will be conducted on a negotiated basis.
 
Title
Authorizing the issuance of limited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $1,000,000.00 for fleet management-related projects; and to declare an emergency ($1,000,000.00).
 
Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
 
Body
See attached file: City of Columbus - 2024 Bonds - Limited Tax Fleet Management Ordinance (final pdf).pdf
